resources.string: Address: Komplek, Jl. Bukit Panderman Hill Jl. Cherry No.10, Temas, Kec. Batu, Jawa Timur 65314

Overlooking Mount Kawi, this polished, modern hotel is 3 km from Jawa Timur Park 1 theme park. Featuring balconies, the refined rooms offer free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs; some have mountain views. Room service is available. Amenities include a restaurant, a bar and a coffee shop,. There are also indoor and outdoor pools, plus a spa, and a gym with a modern spiral staircase. Banquet facilities seat 2,000 people. Breakfast is available.
